content: frozen freeze from snowfall crochet along 2022 the kids took over this year i let my two boys who are currently about to turn 4 and 6 name the snowflakes i quite enjoyed hearing what they came up with as names i hope you enjoy these snowflakes and their names snow flake /ˈsnōˌflāk/ - noun - a flake of snow especially a feathery ice crystal typically displaying delicate six-fold
